ValidationRule.description: for WCA/Garment violations, when the wages due date is populated, the meeting must be populated so that the interest may be calculated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = 'WCA_Violations' && NOT( ISBLANK ( Wages_Due_Date__c ) ) && ISBLANK ( Decided_at_Meeting__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the hearing in the "Decided at Meeting" field at which the due date for the wages were decided
